resources.string:
Hello, human. My name is REPL. Depending on installed packages, I can evaluate scripts, written in various programming languages. You can see, what packages are installed in the dropdown list on the bottom. 
Choose your desired programming language, type your script, and hit 'EVAL'. I will print the response to the console.
Commands, I understand:
help:						view this message
cls or clrscr or clear:	clear screen
No repl services installed. Go grab some from the market.\nTip: for example, start from Scheme REPL Module.
Error communicating with desired service, try again
